body_html:
I wouldn’t know what to multiply by a mask, so that the gradient descent would only train a needed subset of synapses (not tensors, but only certain elements within tensors).

Of course, it is easy to define a control tensor of 1s and 0s indicating fixed and trainable weights. However, I don’t know how to make the gradient descent function use the control tensor.

body:
I wouldn’t know what to multiply by a mask, so that the gradient descent would only train a needed subset of synapses (not tensors, but only certain elements within tensors). 

Of course, it is easy to define a control tensor of 1s and 0s indicating fixed and trainable weights. However, I don’t know how to make the gradient descent function use the control tensor.
